name: Procrastin8
description:
Description

The supply of work at [insert workplace] is endless but you can't have your boss thinking you're working fast and "in need of a challenge". Whenever a new task comes in DON'T DO IT - wait a fair amount of time and let some tasks build up so you can relax a little. When you do a big load of work all in one go you're probably also more likely to be recongnised and get a better reward ;) It's hard to keep this up long term though...how far can you make it?

Click the link below to download! :)

Created in just over a day for the Low Effort Jam 2 by:
Ethan Shellard https://ethanjshellard.itch.io/
Dominique Russell https://dominiquer.itch.io/
